item.title: Autoupgrade - Web Version - Set the shop in maintenance mode
item.description: Autoupgrade - Web Version - Set the shop in maintenance mode Details Component : Core Status : Approved Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-10926 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to the Shop Parameters > General. General > Preferences page is displayed on the “General” tab. Click on the “Maintenance” tab. “Maintenance” tab is displayed. Click on the toggle “Enable store” Toggle is in “No” status. Click on the CTA “Add my IP”.
